name: Bake me Into Your Heart Demo
name_original: Bake me Into Your Heart Demo
description:
Bake Me Into Your Heart is a visual novel dating simulator where instead of dating people you are getting over a rough breakup by talking to pastries. This is a short demo featuring an abridged narrative and only one romance-able character (Croix.)

This demo was created solo during the Nanoreno 2019 Game Jam.
